sense.name: amplify, increase, enlarge
sense.examples: We have also magnified the molecule in the right image. Look at the Electron Microscope pictures to find out which was magnified the most. There are several options to magnify the screen, or portions of it, for visually impaired users. The image on the right is magnified the same, but with increasing resolution. If a tiny piece of the scene is magnified, the distance of its vanishing points is correspondingly magnified. This increasing division of labor magnified the division of men's and women's interests. Their fears of inadequacy magnified the difficulty of teaching writing. The influence of technology and the shifting faces of crime have magnified the need for criminal justice specialists. The gravitational lens not only magnified the radio waves but distorted them into what's called an Einstein Ring.
